channel.title: Need help ASAP Please
channel.description:
For some reason randomly, any 667 client I beleive * (Thats the client I'm having troubles with) (even the desktop one) hasn't been working for me. All it does is say, "Checking for Updates - 1%" then sits there. And this is for ALL of my computers in my house (5 of them) I've tried reinstalling java, jre,jdk on all 5, still nothing. I don't know why it's doing that. Anyone have any ideas?
First thing it does

Second thing it does

Any 667 client I try to use, (Zenith, Disturbed, Matrix) ALL do the same thing!

EDIT: The server is NOT offline. My friend from somewhere else is logged onto right now. With the webclient.

item.title: Need help ASAP Please

item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

Probably pointing to the wrong ondemand address.
